Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: manasa sriperumbudur
Reviews.Content: Cannon has always been my favourite, this was a gift to my father, he loved it. Wifi is the coolest feature

ProductInfo.Features:
PowerShot ELPH 530 HS White Camera
16GB Micro SD Memory Card
NB9L 1000MAH LI-ION Battery, Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
Memory Card Wallet, 57-in-1 USB 2.0 High Speed Memory Card Reader
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, 3 Pack LCD Screen Protectors, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 530 HS White Camera 16GB Bundle
